titles.title: You Did Not Have a Home

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You did not have a home
there were places You visited frequently
You'd take off Your shoes and scratch Your feet
cause You knew the whole world belonged to the meek
but You did not have a home
no You did not have a home

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
So You did not take a wife
there were pretty maids all in a row
lined up to touch the hem of Your robe
but You had no place to take them so You did not take a wife
no You did not take a wife

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
birds have nests foxes have dens
the Hope of the whole world rests upon the shoulders of a Homeless Man
you had the shoulders of a Homeless Man
you did not have a home

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
And You had no stones to throw
you came without an ax to grind
you did not tow the party line
no wonder sight came to the blind
you had no stones to throw
no you had no stones to throw

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
so You rode an ass's fold
the laid down coats and cut down palms
for You and Your donkey to walk upon
but the world can't find what it thinks it wants
on the back of an ass's fold
so i guess You had to get sold
cause the world can't stand what it cannot own
and it can't own You cause You did not have a home

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Birds have nests foxes have dens
the Hope of the whole world rests upon the shoulders of a Homeless Man
You had the shoulders of a Homeless Man
You did not have a home
